title: Design Pattern Implementation
description: Implement design patterns with real-world examples
prompt:
Implement the [PATTERN NAME] design pattern:

Use Case: [DESCRIBE USE CASE]
Context: [PROVIDE CONTEXT]

Requirements:
1. Complete implementation with all components
2. UML diagram (text/ASCII)
3. Component roles and relationships
4. Usage examples
5. Benefits analysis
6. Trade-offs
7. Alternative patterns
8. Best practices

Popular patterns: Singleton, Factory, Builder, Observer, Strategy
example: Implement Strategy pattern for payment processing
